meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of an invitational event or competition.
meanings.sent1: The invitationals tournament was exclusive to top players in the league.
meanings.sent2: She received an invitation to the invitationals golf tournament.
meanings.sent3: The invitationals party had a strict guest list, making it feel like a VIP event.
meanings.sent4: The invitationals atmosphere at the gala made everyone feel like they were part of something special.
meanings.sent5: The invitationals nature of the art show made it a must-see event for art enthusiasts.

meanings.definition: A type of competition or event where participants are invited to compete.
meanings.sent1: The invitationals featured top athletes from around the world.
meanings.sent2: He trained hard to qualify for the invitationals in his sport.
meanings.sent3: The invitationals brought together the best of the best in a friendly competition.
meanings.sent4: Competing in the invitationals was a dream come true for the young swimmer.
meanings.sent5: The invitationals showcased talent from different countries, making it a truly global event.
